DataElement.preferredName: Patient Antiandrogen Therapy Stratification Factors Duration
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the duration or length of time androgen deprivation therapy was administered to a patient as a stratification factor for participation on a clinical trial.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to androgen deprivation therapy administration as a stratification factor for a patient on a clinical trial.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: Treatment with drugs used to block production or interfere with the action of male sex hormones.:Selected pre-treatment factors by which patients are segregated to assure equal balance of these factors before randomization to the intervention arms of a clinical protocol.

Concepts.definition: A therapeutic regimen that utilizes pharmaceuticals to reduce serum levels of male sex hormones.
Selected pre-treatment factors by which patients are segregated to assure equal balance of these factors before randomization to the intervention arms of a clinical protocol.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the duration or length of time androgen deprivation therapy was administered.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Having little (physical) length or seeming to be limited in (temporal) duration.: Term; a limited period of time.: A natural number greater than 5 and less than 7 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of five and one.: One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Of relatively great or greater than average spatial extension or temporal duration.: Term; a limited period of time.: A natural number greater than twenty-nine and less than thirty-one and the quantity that it denotes.: A natural number greater than 1 and less than 3 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of one and one.: One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.
